casebody.data:
Frank S. FOWLER, Appellant, v. A. C. ADERHOLD, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Atlanta, Georgia, Appellee. No. 7566. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Dec. 21, 1934. In forma pauperis. Frank S. Fowler, in pro. per. Lawrence S. Camp, U. S. Atty., I. K. Hay, Asst. U. S. Atty., and H. T. Nichols, Sp. Atty., all of Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before BRYAN, FOSTER, and WALKER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

On the authority of Smith v. United States (C. C. A.) 61 F.(2d) 681, the judgment is affirmed.
